VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerHour: Server time - hour (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerMinute: Server time - minute (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerDate: Server time - date (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerDayOfMonth: Server time - day of month (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerDayOfWeek: Server time - day of week (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerDayOfYear: Server time - day of year (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerQuarter: Server time - quarter (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerSecond: Server time - second (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerWeekOfYear: Server time - week of year (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerMonth: Server time - month (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndServerYear: Server time - year (Time of last action)
VisitTime.PluginDescription: Reports the local time and the server time when your visitors view your website or app.
VisitTime.WidgetByDayOfWeekDocumentation: This graph shows the number of visits your website received on each day of the week.
VisitTime.WidgetLocalTimeDocumentation: This graph shows what time it was in the %1$s visitors' time zones %2$s during their visits.
VisitTime.WidgetServerTimeDocumentation: This graph shows what time it was in the %1$s server's time zone %2$s during the visits.
